data.title: Sort by length - FLLV Edition
data.statement: You are given a string of words (sentences sometimes) taken from the Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas book, and you need to sort them by their length and alphabetically (ascending order) for words of the same length. Characters case does matter in sorting : words with first letter uppercase will appear after lowercase words ("Hello" after "hello").

testCases.title: Sentence
testCases.testIn: We were somewhere around Barstow on the edge of the desert when the drugs began to take hold
testCases.testOut: of on to We the the the edge hold take were when began drugs around desert Barstow somewhere

testCases.title: Colors
testCases.testIn: green yellow purple orange blue red white
testCases.testOut: red blue green white orange purple yellow

testCases.title: Characters case matters
testCases.testIn: The Circus Circus is what the whole hep world would be doing if the Third Reich had won the war
testCases.testOut: be if is had hep the the the The war won what doing Reich Third whole world would Circus Circus

testCases.title: Characters case matters
testCases.testIn: What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas except for the memories and the photos what a trip
testCases.testOut: a in in and for the the trip what What stays Vegas Vegas except photos happens memories

testCases.title: Lot of words
testCases.testIn: gonzo raoul duke attorney drugs desert hallucination lizard barstow hotel batcountry paranoia suitcase ether mescaline adrenochrome fear loathing thompson journalism americandream hst vegas roadtrip nixon casino mojave redshark tripping psychedelic bathtub circus
testCases.testOut: hst duke fear drugs ether gonzo hotel nixon raoul vegas casino circus desert lizard mojave barstow bathtub attorney loathing paranoia redshark roadtrip suitcase thompson tripping mescaline batcountry journalism psychedelic adrenochrome americandream hallucination

testCases.title: Lot of words
testCases.testIn: butter cheese forest galaxy island kitten lumber meadow needle orange pebble quaint rabbit sunset tangle umbrella valley window xylophone yogurt zephyr breeze melody whisper twilight rainbow seashell
testCases.testOut: breeze butter cheese forest galaxy island kitten lumber meadow melody needle orange pebble quaint rabbit sunset tangle valley window yogurt zephyr rainbow whisper seashell twilight umbrella xylophone

testCases.title: Very long words starting by the same string
Very long words starting by the same string
Words of same length
testCases.testIn: drugs chaos panic abyss Gonzo Raoul Vegas
testCases.testOut: abyss chaos drugs Gonzo panic Raoul Vegas

testCases.title: Words of same length
testCases.testIn: cipher binary server github widget kernel tunnel django mobile import
testCases.testOut: binary cipher django github import kernel mobile server tunnel widget

testCases.title: Character cases matters 2
testCases.testIn: We were somewhere around Barstow on The edge of the desert when the drugs began to take hold
testCases.testOut: of on to We the the The edge hold take were when began drugs around desert Barstow somewhere

testCases.title: Character cases matters 2
testCases.testIn: green yellow purple White orange blue red white
testCases.testOut: red blue green white White orange purple yellow

data.constraints:
2 < number of words in [[words]] < 40
0 < word length in [[words]] < 50
All words in [[words]] contain <<alphabetical characters only>>.
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1>> : a string [[words]] of words separated by spaces
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1>> : the [[words]] string sorted by length and alphabetically for words of same length.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given a string of words (sentences sometimes) taken from the Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas book, and you need to sort them by their length and alphabetically (ascending order) for words of the same length. Characters case does matter in sorting : words with first letter uppercase will appear after lowercase words ("Hello" after "hello").
Input
Line 1 : a string words of words separated by spaces
Output
Line 1 : the words string sorted by length and alphabetically for words of same length.
Constraints
2 < number of words in words < 40
0 < word length in words < 50
All words in words contain alphabetical characters only.
Example
Input
We were somewhere around Barstow on the edge of the desert when the drugs began to take hold
Output
of on to We the the the edge hold take were when began drugs around desert Barstow somewhere
